meta.description: Schedule in-vivo and ex-vivo experiments to minimize total radiation while respecting time constraints.

params.name: prep_time
params.description: Preparation time in minutes for each experiment type

params.name: exec_time
params.description: Execution time in minutes for each experiment type

params.name: radiation
params.description: Radiation units received from each experiment type

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each type of experiment to schedule

objective.name: min_total_radiation
objective.description: Minimize the total radiation received by the researcher

constraints.name: prep_time_constraint
constraints.description: Total preparation time must not exceed 400 minutes

constraints.name: exec_time_constraint
constraints.description: Total execution time must not exceed 500 minutes
